title: paNNuDan paNiyuDan
sahitya:
paNNuDan paNiyuDan bhAvanA rasattuDan paramanai anbu sheivOm manamE 



anupallavi



kaNNuDan kadiranak-kalanduyirk-kuyirAgum kaDavuLai idayattil

naTamiDum jyOtiyaip



caraNam



gAna rasAmrtam kaLippuDan uNDu nam kavalaiyai mATriDuvOm

hIna viSayangaLil nAnenrahankarittE EghiDAmal Atma dAgattuDan manamE
